Play:
The Drum of the Waves of Horikawa
(Horikawa nami no tsuzumi / 堀川波の鼓)

Written By: Chikamatsu Monzaemon (近松門左衛門)

First Staged: 1707 (宝永4)

Reference: Major Plays of Chikamatsu, translated by Donald Keene, (New York: Columbia University Press, 1961); Kokuritsu Gekijō jōen shiryōshū, edited by Kokuritsu Gekijō Geinō Chōsashitsu, vol. 212, February 1983; Bunraku February 1983 Performance Program

– Click image to view.

Performances:

February 1983: The Drum of the Waves of Horikawa

July 1985: The Drum of the Waves of Horikawa

February 1989: The Drum of the Waves of Horikawa

February 1995: The Drum of the Waves of Horikawa

Kakuzo (Chūgen Kakuzō / 中間角蔵)

Maid (Gejo / 下女)

Yukaemon (Isobe Yukaemon / 磯部床右衛門)

Rin (Gejo Rin / 下女りん)

Hikokuro (Ogura Hikokurō / 小倉彦九郎)

Sangohei's messanger (Sagohei shisha / 三五平使者)

Yura (Imōto Yura / 妹ゆら)

Bean curd peddler (Tofu uri / 豆腐売)
